mapper.insert: insert into Home_Img_tb(img_num, home_num, home_img_name, home_img_path) values((select nvl(max(img_num), 0) + 1 from Home_Img_tb), #{homeNum}, #{homeImgName}, #{homeImgPath})
mapper.select: select home_num AS homeNum, home_img_name AS homeImgName, home_img_path AS homeImgPath from Home_Img_tb
select home_num AS homeNum, home_img_name AS homeImgName, home_img_path AS homeImgPath from Home_Img_tb where home_num = #{homeNum}
